mapper.sql: lh_id, lh_user_id, lh_la_id, lh_who_checked, lh_check_time, lh_is_check, la_commons, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3
mapper.insert: insert into gd_lending_history (lh_id, lh_user_id, lh_la_id, lh_who_checked, lh_check_time, lh_is_check, la_commons, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3) values (#{lhId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lhUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lhLaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lhWhoChecked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lhCheckTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lhIsCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{laCommons,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into gd_lending_history
lh_id,
lh_user_id,
lh_la_id,
lh_who_checked,
lh_check_time,
lh_is_check,
la_commons,
attribute1,
attribute2,
attribute3,
#{lhId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lhUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lhLaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lhWhoChecked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lhCheckTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update gd_lending_history
lh_user_id = #{lhUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lh_la_id = #{lhLaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lh_who_checked = #{lhWhoChecked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lh_check_time = #{lhCheckTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lh_is_check = #{lhIsCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
la_commons = #{laCommons,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where lh_id = #{lhId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update gd_lending_history set lh_user_id = #{lhUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lh_la_id = #{lhLaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lh_who_checked = #{lhWhoChecked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lh_check_time = #{lhCheckTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lh_is_check = #{lhIsCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, la_commons = #{laCommons,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where lh_id = #{lhId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name, u.attribute1 user_identity, h.lh_check_time, h.attribute1, h.la_commons, h.lh_is_check FROM gd_lending_apply a, gd_lending_history h, gd_users u WHERE a.la_id = h.lh_la_id AND h.lh_who_checked = u.user_id AND lh_la_id = #{lhLaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT u.user_name, u.attribute1 user_identity, e.e_is_returned e_is_returned, h.lh_id, h.lh_user_id, h.lh_la_id, h.lh_who_checked, h.lh_check_time, h.lh_is_check, h.la_commons, h.attribute1, h.attribute2, h.attribute3 FROM gd_lending_apply a, gd_lending_history h, gd_users u, gd_expense e WHERE a.la_id = h.lh_la_id AND h.lh_user_id = u.user_id AND e.e_la_id = a.la_id
